players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am not the one who killed Charlie. I believe we should focus on finding the real culprit and not accuse each other baselessly."

You: "Let's focus on finding the real culprit, but we should also be cautious and not accuse each other without solid evidence. We have reason to believe that Diana is the mafioso, so let's keep an eye on them."
Diana: "I have an important announcement to make. Last night, I had a dream that revealed the identity of the culprit. Based on this dream, I believe Bob is the one who killed Charlie."
